model.description: This is the model for component encoding, version 1.0

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEObject
entity.description: Represents a an object used in the context of Interface Editor

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEWOComponent
entity.description: Represents an abstract WOComponent: root class for all objects representing a WOComponent

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEPageComponent
entity.description: Represents a WOComponent displaying a whole page

property.name: deprecatedTopComponentList
property.description: Ordered list of all top-level components

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEOperationComponent
entity.description: Represents a whole-page WOComponent related to a OperationComponentDefinition attached to an OperationNode

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IETabComponent
entity.description: Represents a whole-page WOComponent representing a thumbnail embedded in a IEOperationComponent

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEPopupComponent
entity.description: Represents a whole-page popup-WOComponent attached to a FlexoProcess

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEMonitoringScreen
entity.description: Represents a whole-page WOComponent representing a perspective to monitor a FlexoProcess

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IEMonitoringComponent
entity.description: Represents a WOComponent (reusable component generally embedded in a IEOperationComponent or a IEMonitoring Screen) representing a perspective to monitor a FlexoProcess

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEAbstractWidget
entity.description: Abstract class defining the common behaviour of a widget. Subclassed in IEDSWidget (a widget in the palette) and IEWidget (a widget embedded in a WOComponent)

entity.name: org.openflexo.ie.view.palette.IEDSWidget
entity.description: Represents a widget in the palette. This widget has no parent nor woComponent

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEWidget
entity.description: Abstract class defining the common behaviour of a widget embedded in a WOComponent

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.AbstractButtonedWidget
entity.description: Abstract class containing buttons

property.name: deprecatedButtonList
property.description: List of all buttons defined for this buttoned widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEControlWidget
entity.description: Represent a dynamic controlled widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEEditableTextWidget
entity.description: Represents a dynamic component used to edit text

property.name: fieldLabel
property.description: The field label will be used in the validation, in msg like 'the title field is mandatory'.

property.name: bindingName
property.description: Name of the field. Used in javascript,...

property.name: tfcssClass
property.description: Specified to use a specific css Class

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IENonEditableTextWidget
entity.description: Represents a dynamic component used to edit text

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEBlocWidget
entity.description: Represents a bloc

property.name: hideTable
property.description: True if this bloc header and footer will not be visible, but it content will be.

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETabContainerWidget
entity.description: Represents a thumbnail container

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEHTMLTableWidget
entity.description: Represents a HTML table

property.name: grid
property.description: Defines the feature of having grid around cells

property.name: noCSS
property.description: Defines the feature of having no alternate color for rows.

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.IETopComponent
entity.description: Abstract representation of a top-level component embedded in a page

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETabWidget
entity.description: Represent a Thumbnail inside a IETabContainerWidget

property.name: WOComponentName
property.description: Name of component coding the thumbnail

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEButtonWidget
entity.description: Represents a button widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEHyperlinkWidget
entity.description: Represents an hyperlink widget

property.name: hyperlinkType
property.description: Defines hyperlink type (Submit, Save, Cancel, New, URL, DA, Image)

property.name: openInNewWindow
property.description: true if the link will open a new window.

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IELabelWidget
entity.description: Represents a label widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEStringWidget
entity.description: Represents a string widget

property.name: keyPath
property.description: keyPath is the key of the dictionary

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEHeaderWidget
entity.description: Represents a header widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEWysiwygWidget
entity.description: Represents a wysiwyg widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IECheckBoxWidget
entity.description: Represents a checkbox widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEDropDownWidget
entity.description: Represents a dropdown widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETextFieldWidget
entity.description: Represents a 'TextField' widget

property.name: fieldType
property.description: Type of the value to enter in the text field.

property.name: formatType
property.description: Format of the value to enter in the text field.

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETextAreaWidget
entity.description: Represents a 'TextArea' widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IEButtonContainerWidget
entity.description: Represents a button container widget

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETRWidget
entity.description: Represents a row of an HTML table

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.ie.widget.IETDWidget
entity.description: Represents a cell of a row of an HTML table
